emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of children from Junior Fire Patrol of Forbes Elementary including Michael Kiritchenko holding mask, and Ronnie Springer and Joyce Hardwick wearing hats, and men, including teacher William Gaskins on left, Anthony Patrone in center, and Safety Director John Hartman in uniform, posed in fire station
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 21, 1961, pg. 18, reads: "Visit Fire Department - Members of the Junior Fire Patrol of Forbes Elementary School had an opportunity to see how their heroes operate, during a recent tour of one of the city's fire-fighting unites. Above, they chat with Inspector Anthony Patrone, center, and John Hartman, right, safety director and supervisor for the Board of Education.  Some of the youngsters are Michael Kiritchenko (with mask), Ronnie Springer and Joyce Hardwick (both wearing hats).  William Gaskins, teacher and sponsor for the groups, is shown at the left, to the rear. - Harris Photo."
